replies.body: I don't even care who wins give me a good song and may the best team win!
Yeah Riot set a high bar last year with Worlds, Rise and KDA were both amazing!!!! I don't think we'll get another music line this year but I'm really hoping for a good worlds song!! xD
The leak mentioned something to do with Lindsey Sterling doing the music for Worlds.
if this is true ima flip my fucking shit esp if its gunna have great vocals omg.... like Amy Lee

OMFG seriously??
I LOVEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE her!!!

Warriors was the best song, Rise and KDA were good but Imagine Dragons good. My opinion of course
Logged in just to up vote. Cannot wait for another great hit <3
I mean it could be NF Riot seems to be on a kick of NF this year (not counting that god awful Na finals show
what if i have 4/5 ultimate skins
You will get the shards for the skins you already own!

Would it be possible to get Blue Essence or something instead? Some people have no use for Orange Essence and 5 skin shards only crafts one random skin. Or possibly get something like Rusted Blitzcrank?

for how often people actually get every single bracket correct they probably dont worry too much about it and this kind of situation, itd be nice if they just traded the ones you own into RP tho, even like a percentage of the ultimate skins RP, 33% of an ulti skins value is a 1350 skin or really close right?
A man of culture. I have all but Sona.

Who do YOU think is going to win this year? Do you think you'll get the perfect pick?

Myself:
-SKT because I'm stuck in 2016
-I doubt I'll even get 34 points like last year {{champion:32}}
C9 because they really have been building up their reputation these passed few worlds and I have hope in them!
As a fellow C9 fan, I'm more hoping we just get out of groups. Then all 3 of my favorite foreign teams were stuck into group C, so I'm very emo right now.
GAM - just wanted to say that. No one ever supports them.
were gonna see the clutch gaming world championship, just you wait...

I personally think that if you have a perfect pick'em, you should be able to pick any skin in the game you want... including limited skins, victorious skins, pax skins, beta skins.  any skin that was ever made.
Almost any skin. Any skin that was available for purchase in the past should be an option. No victorious or pax skins though
yeah, absolutely no victorious, pax, beta, pre-order etc. any skin that used to be sold could be fair tho.

yeah, no lmfao, thats a bit much, victorious skins were given to players who earned it at the time, you cant just bring stuff like that back just "because". And yeah i get that the odds of winning are astronomical, but still, they shouldn't be brought back in any way.
An Riot employee has never commented on my comment before. Will this be my first? :0
Will YOU prove worthy?...Probably not. {{champion:141}}
God I had to log in just to upvote you
At least TSM isn't here again to mess up my pick 'ems...
The new poro icon has to be the best one yet, love the gold color in it.
I'd like to refuse the prizes in order to preserve the LoL logo if I win.
i have all ultimate skin already XD
instead of ultimate skins, why not get prestige skins for 100%
This actually isn't a bad idea, especially since Prestige is supposed to be something you "work" towards. It really would make em Prestige in this case
Its... not though? it's supposed to be something 'certain audiences' splurge massive amounts of irl money on

Except no. The original purpose of the Prestige skin line was to be a "collectors" skin that is very hard to obtain that you have to put in massive amounts of time to work for. Just because you CAN splurge money to get them instantly (which is what Riot even says is possible; "Players can always use event loot purchases as a way to supplement their token earn rates") doesn't mean that that was Riot's original purpose of the series. Or at least the verbal purpose that they conveyed.

If you don't believe me, go back to the Patch 8.21 era. Or you can just click [this](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/client-new-features-feedback/qKY4WrdK-kda-kaisa-prestige-edition)

When I saw the big announcement for the Final Fantasy 7 remaster, I thought I couldn't care less about anything ever again.

I have been proven wrong.
Didn't I predict all of the last "Pick Em" stuff that happened? Is there a way I could see what I predicted and to confirm if I did somehow get it 100% correct?
Considering Pick Em hasn't even opened yet I'd say you don't need to bother checking to see if you predicted everything correctly yet.

No no, there was one like a couple years back that's why
